Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Molecular Mechanisms of Pharmacological Action/Neurotransmitter Agents/Glycine Agents
Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Neurotransmitter Agents/Glycine Agents
Record.Description: Substances used for their pharmacological actions on glycinergic systems. Glycinergic agents include agonists, antagonists, degradation or uptake inhibitors, depleters, precursors, and modulators of receptor function.
